modName: True Light - Custom ENB with FXAA PPI settings
summary: True to life lighting and darkness achieved with custom settings based on the amazing works of  Boris Vorontsov and some_dude.
descriptionHtml:
=========================================================================================
ADDED new shots from upcoming v2.0!
=========================================================================================

Realistic natural true to life lighting effects for Skyrim. You will definitely need to keep a torch handy from now on! Also gives a more natural eye adaptation of the light. This is a work in progress with updates coming soon, just wanted to get this out there, more details to come..

Strongly recommended for use with awesome mod by Pluto found here: http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2896

Make sure you re-install any previous versions of ENB or FXAA PPI before installation. Just drop all the files into your main Skyrim folder and enjoy!

Will release various levels of darkness if requested so let me know and please ENDORSE if you like :)
author: joey4track

files.name: True Light - Custom ENB with FXAA PPI settings
